caption.p: Assumed baseline survival curves for PID patients in populations with R 0Â values for WPV1 of 4 or 5 and assumed treatment fractions as a function of time, by income level. a Baseline survival curves, compared with reported survival for CVID patients in high-income countries [ 34]. b Fraction of PID patients treated with IVIG, based on literature [ 20, 26, 30, 31, 36, 45] and judgment
